word_mean: 胚胎学：研究胚胎阶段个体发育的科学，广义说，是指生命周期中几个甚至全部的前期和后续阶段

sentence.Network_en: Against the belief in such abrupt changes, embryology enters a strong protest.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于这种突然变化的信念, 在胚胎学上提出了强有力的反证.

sentence.Network_en: This latter statement finds support in contemporary works on angiosperm embryology.
sentence.Network_cn: 后者这一说法,在当代被子植物胚胎学研究中获得了支持.

sentence.Network_en: The classical literature of embryology documents these patterns in detail for the zygote.
sentence.Network_cn: 胚胎学的经典文献详细地报道了合子的这些式样.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ... . . . .组胚学(the histology and embryology)是指组织学(histology)与胚胎学(embryology)两门相互关联的学科。我国医学教育习惯地将它列为一门基础课程。.
ecology生态学embryology胚胎学, 发生学toxicology毒理学, 毒物学

list.abs: 胚胎学在医学中称人体胚胎学(human embryology)。定义：
...实验胚胎学编辑实验胚胎学(experimental embryology)用实验方法干扰胚胎，研究胚胎的各部分在发育中的相互作用，从而探讨胚胎发育中的因果关系的胚胎学分支学科，目录1学科起源蓬勃发展发育机制学</.
...相互关系。目录1定义2特点3作用4研究对象5研究成果1定义比较胚胎学比较胚胎学(comparative embryology)，以比较不同种系动物(包括人类)的胚胎发育为研究内容.
embryoid 胚状体embryological genetics 发育遗传学embryology 胚胎学

entry.def: Embryology is the scientific study of embryos and their development.

means.word_mean: 1. the branch of biology that studies the formation and early development of living organisms

auth_sentence.content: Draft proposals will be published to reform the regulation of human embryology.
auth_sentence.res_content: Draft proposals will be published to reform the regulation of human embryology.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Draft proposals will be published to reform the regulation of human embryology.

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, most of the work involved is performed by a very dedicated embryology team and often on their own time.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, most of the work involved is performed by a very dedicated embryology team and often on their own time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed, most of the work involved is performed by a very dedicated embryology team and often on their own time.

auth_sentence.content: But critics have countered that findings from turtle embryology hinted that the backbones and ribs morphed to make a shell.
auth_sentence.res_content: But critics have countered that findings from turtle embryology hinted that the backbones and ribs morphed to make a shell.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But critics have countered that findings from turtle embryology hinted that the backbones and ribs morphed to make a shell.
